name: Dog Jobs
description:
Get to the end of the level by controlling your dogs.

Change the Leashes length to change the pull force of each individual dog.

Pull the red ball closer to you to make the dog pull less hard.

Pull the red ball away from you to make the dog pull harder.

Get to the end as fast as possible, but be careful of the environment, if you hit other object, you'll need to pay for them.

Tools used

Blender, Unity3D, Procreate, Garageband
